name: Milk Party VR
description:
Karlson vibe is a music composed by the music composer -Evan King.

The music was done for a game called 'Milkman Karlson'  which is developed by a famous game developer - Danidev. So, during lockdown, it was boring life. Which made me think of this absolute banger idea making a VR version of karlson vibe.

[Warning!] There are so many colours, don't use it for more than 30 minutes.

The game to all milkers. Cheers gamers🥛, drink your milk...

👀 and I hope you can find out the Easter eggs I kept secretly in this game.

#milk
